Package com.hp.autonomy.hod.client.api.textindex.query.search

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FindRelatedConceptsService
    Service representing the FindRelatedConcepts API
    FindSimilarService<T>
    Service representing the FindSimilarDocuments API
    QueryTextIndexService<T>
    Interface representing the QueryTextIndex API
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Document
    A document returned from an HP Haven OnDemand index
    Document.Builder  
    Documents
    Top level response from the QueryTextIndex API and FindSimilar API.
    Documents.Builder  
    Entity
    An entity returned from an HP Haven OnDemand index
    Entity.Builder  
    FindRelatedConceptsRequestBuilder
    Helper class for building up optional parameters for the Find Related Concepts API.
    FindRelatedConceptsServiceImpl
    Default implementation of FindRelatedConceptsService
    FindSimilarServiceImpl<T>
    Default implementation of FindSimilarService

    If you don't need a custom return type use the FindSimilarServiceImpl.documentsService(HodServiceConfig) static factory
    QueryRequestBuilder
    Helper class for building up optional parameters for the QueryTextIndex API and FindSimilar API.
    QueryTextIndexServiceImpl<T>
    Default implementation of QueryTextIndexService

    If you don't need a custom return type use the QueryTextIndexServiceImpl.documentsService(HodServiceConfig) static factory
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Highlight
    Enum type representing the possible options for the highlight parameter
    Print
    Enum type representing the possible options for the print parameter
    Sort
    Enum type representing the possible options for the sort parameter
    Summary
    Enum type representing the possible options for the summary parameter
